panels.description: Number of UTXOs owned by address types we support.
panels.title: Address UTXOs Count

targets.expr:
sum (
    0.99 * api_access_target{ic="$ic", job="bitcoin-watchdog-$network-canister", flag="enabled"},
    0.5 * api_access_target{ic="$ic", job="bitcoin-watchdog-$network-canister", flag="disabled"},
    0.01 * api_access_target{ic="$ic", job="bitcoin-watchdog-$network-canister", flag="undefined"},
)

sum (
    0.99 * api_access{ic="$ic", job="bitcoin-$network-canister", flag="enabled"},
    0.5 * api_access{ic="$ic", job="bitcoin-$network-canister", flag="disabled"},
    0.01 * api_access{ic="$ic", job="bitcoin-$network-canister", flag="undefined"},
)

panels.description: Note: Using a magic number `8181818181` in the query turns `NaN` values from zeros to chart gaps.

targets.expr:
# Using a magic number `8181818181` in the query turns `NaN` values from zeros to chart gaps.
((height_diff{ic="$ic", job="bitcoin-watchdog-$network-canister"} +8181818181) > 0) -8181818181

panels.title: Bitcoin Canister Height Diff

panels.description: The number of instructions required to insert a block into the stable UTXO set
panels.title: Stable Block Ingestion Cost

panels.description: The number of rounds required to insert a block into the stable UTXO set
panels.title: Stable Block Ingestion Duration, Rounds
